TopicTitle: A rover to Minmus - .90 Career mode

Articles.Content:
Images are here

This was a fun one to create - I play with a fairly realistic set of self imposed rules, and some imposed by FAR, and other mods. Basically, it all has to fit into something that looks like a rocket.

I didn't bother to share photos of the booster, but it was just 4 more orange tanks radial, asparagus staged with Rockomax Skipper engines. Ascent was very dicey due to having pretty much exactly the right amount of DV and barely a drop more. Everything else has had plenty of room for error.

Hope you enjoy the shots.

nice work. so did the rover just use RCS for descent/ascent? not be surprised if am missing something but cant see any rocket engines.

the rover looked great how you had it docked during transfer
